availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas and Sarah Vessels. Married to Emmaline Cissell on February 17, 1857. Father of Mary Vessels, Thomas Emmanuel Vessels, Euphrasia Vessels, Sarah Harriet Vessels, and William Francis Vessels. Farmer in Meade County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, p. 398.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, District no. 3, p. 316.
